/usr/bin/clang++ -g CMakeFiles/open.dir/src/open.cpp.o -o open  -Wl,-rpath,/home/mint/open/open/lib /home/mint/open/open/lib/libopencv_core.so /home/mint/open/open/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so /home/mint/open/open/lib/libopencv_highgui.so /home/mint/open/open/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so /home/mint/open/open/lib/libopencv_videoio.so /home/mint/open/open/lib/libopencv_video.so
